title: No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
OB: When trying to access the type hierarchy of binary projects (e.g., org.apache.ant), I get the following error: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. BTW, what does the message mean?
EB: When trying to access the type hierarchy of binary projects (e.g., org.apache.ant), I get the following error: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. I also need clarification on what this error message means.
SR:
1. Open the software
2. Navigate to a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant)
3. Attempt to access the type hierarchy
4. Observe the error message
